name: Ponos Imperial
description:
Quite simply, R6 Pro's Ponos boots were built for backbreaking work. Constructed out of Thermosulate technology, these waterproof and insulated workboots are rated for sub-arctic environments while the Composite outsole ignores hazards to maintain traction when you need it most.
Women's sizes currently out of stock.
description_cn:
简而言之，R6 Pro的珀诺斯靴子就是为艰苦工作而制造。这些防水隔热的工作靴采用绝热技术制成，适用于亚北极环境，而复合材料的鞋底可以无视危险，为您提供必要的抓地力。
女款目前缺货。
